title: NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS * Magnetic Attraction & Flexibility *
description:
Dr. Marco Paret and his students will demonstrate you a hypnosis technique for magnetic attraction and flexibility. These images are from the Mesmerismus Masterclass of non-verbal hypnosis in Slovenia. Dr. Paret is achiving the hypnotic state using the technique of Fascination - The power of the gaze, on which he did many researches. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
